//Sum ofinteger by using variable
public class Q3_Java_Ass
 {

	public static void main(String[] args) 
	{
		// TODO Auto-generated method stub
		int A = '5';
		int B = '7';
		int C = '2';
		int D = '9';
		int E = '6';
		System.out.println("Sum of INT :"+(A+B+C+D+E));

	}

}

Output:-
Sum of INT :269
